sentence.Network_en: Its trade and industrial policies should be used more ambitiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 其贸易和工业政策的适用范围应该扩大。

sentence.Network_en: He is working on his life story, ambitiously planned as a 50-volume work.
sentence.Network_cn: 他正着力于写作他的传记，雄心勃勃地计划要写50卷。

sentence.Network_en: Let's think big , ie plan ambitiously.

entry.tran: 有雄心的；有抱负的；有野心的
entry.def: Someone who is ambitious has a strong desire to be successful, rich, or powerful.

example.ex: Chris is so ambitious, so determined to do it all...
example.tran: 克里斯踌躇满志，决心要将它都做完。

example.ex: He's a very ambitious lad and he wants to play at the highest level.
example.tran: 他是个很有抱负的小伙子，想参加最高水平的比赛。

entry.def: An ambitious idea or plan is on a large scale and needs a lot of work to be carried out successfully.

example.ex: The ambitious project was completed in only nine months...
example.tran: 这个规模宏大的项目只用了9个月就完成了。

means.word_mean: 1. in an ambitious and energetic manner;

auth_sentence.content: It seemed to him they weren't riding very ambitiously.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seemed to him they weren't riding very ambitiously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seemed to him they weren't riding very ambitiously.

auth_sentence.content: It is important that Serbia remains committed to an ambitiously firm agenda and to its dialogue with Pristina.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is important that Serbia remains committed to an ambitiously firm agenda and to its dialogue with Pristina.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is important that Serbia remains committed to an ambitiously firm agenda and to its dialogue with Pristina.

auth_sentence.content: It's ambitiously shot: last week they jumped from a bridge to a moving train.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's ambitiously shot: last week they jumped from a bridge to a moving train.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's ambitiously shot: last week they jumped from a bridge to a moving train.
